name: Home by the Sea (text-based)
description:
This is my first try at a text-based adventure game.  I'm taking a Udemy's Learn to Code by Making Games - Complete C# Unity, and this game was made as an exercise to get used to coding.  It's a text-based haunted house themed text adventure game. 

There are no battle system, so you simply have to go through the rooms and pick up items in the correct order to clear the game.  Hope you enjoy! And happy learning!
